org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.impl.sparql

Class SparqlBasedSink

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.impl.sparql.SparqlBasedSink
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.Sink, org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.SinkBase, org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.tripleBased.AdvancedTripleBasedSink, org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.tripleBased.TripleBasedSink, org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.UnstructuredDataSink

    public class SparqlBasedSink
extends Object
implements org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.tripleBased.AdvancedTripleBasedSink, org.dice_research.squirrel.sink.Sink
    A sink which stores the data in different graphs in a sparql based db.

                       String updateAppendix,

                       String updateMetaDataAppendix,
                       String queryMetaDataAppendix)
        Constructor of SparqlBasedSink.
        Parameters:
        host - The host name of the sink.
        port - The port of the sink.
        updateAppendix - The update appendix for the content data
        queryAppendix - The query appendix for the content data
        updateMetaDataAppendix - The update appendix for the meta data
        queryMetaDataAppendix - The query appendix for the meta data
